text:
OS: linux red hat 7.1 updated with Sun JDK 1.3.1: /usr/bin/tomcat start says: 
Segmentation error line 138
for information: tomcat works with Blackdown JDK 1.3.1
(default configuration: tomcat was installed from RPM packages)

text:
This a problem in the JDK used, never a seg fault can be caused by a Java 
Program only by a faulty JVM..
